message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might offer. Considering its true worth and your potential interest, I propose a price of $120 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. In light of that, I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our respective positions while still allowing me to earn a reasonable profit. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to propose $85 for the product.
